experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Reconcile bank accounts daily; process accounts payable; maintain general ledgers; create and modify existing Excel documents; maintain and process payroll; maintain accounting system; perform month-end procedures and account reconciliations; create and modify existing journal entries; perform accounting data reconciliations and verifications; prepare and file 1099s, 941s, 940s, W-2s, and C-3s; pay payroll taxes every pay period using EFTPS; roll over tax and fiscal years at year-end and perform all closing procedures; organize and prepare files for yearly audit.

experience.title: Office Assistant
experience.description: Answer phone; deliver mail; help professors maintain Excel documents; organize papers for professors.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting
